ygData.subject: Re: Stupid Moron Spellcasters (Rated R)
ygData.msgSnippet: Listen very closely: As a fellow melee class, I can understand, if just a bit, where you re coming from. But you re a bit inexperienced in EQ,
ygData.messageBody:
Listen very closely:<br><br>As a fellow melee
class, I can understand, if just a bit, where you're
coming from.<br><br>But you're a bit inexperienced in
EQ, which is quite obvious with your
"rant."<br><br>When you are THAT low on life, the best thing you can
hope for is that your healer gets a spell off.
Because, like it or not, the mob is aggro'd on you
COMPLETELY. No matter what anyone else does, short of a mem
blur, it's not going to stop attacking you.<br><br>As
to the caster medding through combat: give me a
break. That's what casters do.<br><br>I'd like to know
what server you play on, and what your character's
name is. That way, I can avoid a piss-poor player who
doesn't understand how to play the game.
